title: Expressions of Interest
subtitle: Near new townhouse in boutique complex!
description:
It is a pleasure to bring to market this rare opportunity for you to get in early and secure this intelligently designed, near new, two-level street front townhouse, in this enviable location in Burswood.  
This is the perfect opportunity for those aiming for a tranquil and uncomplicated lifestyle, in a classy boutique development of only 6 townhouses.

The combination of render and feature brick brings alive a contemporary design, featuring a gorgeous colour palate of earthy tones with inspiring interior finishes, superb quality, and a pleasing entertainer-sized enclosed courtyard.
The interior layout will please all who desire an open plan design, yet with distinctive sections for the kitchen, living, and dining areas. 
The kitchen boasts Calcite Essa stone bench tops, double under-mount sink, 900ml gas cook top and electric oven, sleek slim-line curved range-hood, an abundance of cupboard space, and designer glass splash-back.

The remainder of the ground level consists of a powder room and self-contained Laundry, with stone bench-top and ample cupboard space, and entry through to a drying courtyard. Completing the ground level is the double lock-up garage with shopper's entry.
The home boasts the premium instantaneous Rinnai B26 gas hot water system, ducted reverse cycle air conditioning throughout, quality tiling through the living and wet areas, carpeted stairways and bedrooms, gas bayonet points in the living area, roof insulation, NBN availability, and storage under the stairs.

The upstairs consists of the spacious main bedroom with stone-topped ensuite bathroom, and walk-in robe. Bedroom two has a twin-sized built-in robe, and bedroom three with a triple-sized built-in robe. Both bedrooms share the family bathroom, with both bath and shower with semi-frameless shower screen, stone bench top, and decorative vanity.

This sought-after location is literally minutes away to the popular Albany Highway café strip with its endless selection of classic, contemporary, and funky eating spots, along with vibrant Bars and Pubs including the Broken Hill Hotel, making this now the longest and most diverse Café Strip in Perth. You will walk among such a diverse array of street shopping outlets, which makes a refreshing alternative to the usual franchises in most café and shopping precincts scattered throughout Perth, with Victoria Park Central also contributing largely to the excitement and buzz of shopping in Victoria Park.

For entertainment you are spoilt with the amazing facility of the Crown Casino only 1.4km away, and the new Optus Stadium only 2.3km away, with its award-winning parks and recreation playgrounds for the kids, and the ever popular Camfield Bar for the adults, with a pleasing “family Feel” atmosphere. Combine this with major parks such as Duncan Reserve and G.O Edwards Park and you will realise that enjoying the outdoors has never been easier.
Adding to this now with the new Matagarup Walk Bridge spanning over the Swan River, and connecting you to the hub of shopping, cafes, and bars at Claise Brook Cove in East Perth, you have numerous options on how to enjoy your leisure time, be it on land or on the water.

Schooling and Education facilities near Burswood are numerous, including Ursula Frayne College, Perth Montessori School, Victoria Park Primary, St Augustine Primary, Trinity College, and Mercedes College.
This Burswood location is further enhanced with its proximity to a large variety of buses along Shepperton Road and the Victoria Park Train Station only 550m away.

It is hard to imagine a more desirable central location than this. Everything you need is virtually at your fingertips. Simply take an easy stroll to Rokeby Road where you will enjoy some of Perth's best cafes, bars and restaurants, or walk to the nearby Subiaco train station and take a short ride to either the nearby Perth CBD, or beautiful Fremantle. There are numerous  supermarkets and retail shops just minutes from your door step, with Kings Park, UWA, the pristine Swan River and Cottesloe Beach all just a short drive away. 
Located within the sought after Bob Hawke College catchment area, the kids can also easily walk to nearby Subiaco Primary School, with Perth Modern also a very short drive. 
Perfect for professional singles, couples, lock up and leave families, investors or those in the country wanting the ideal Perth base, this stylish easy care home is a wonderful opportunity to enjoy the best inner city living has to offer.

title: High $700,000's
subtitle: The Definition of Privacy and Convenience!
description:
Nestled right in the heart of Leederville yet tranquilly towards the rear of a securely-gated boutique complex, this impressive 3 bedroom 2 bathroom standalone townhouse is arguably the pick of the bunch and has no common walls, is set very far back from the street and has a practical floor plan that will suit the personal needs of many.

Its central Oxford Street location is the highlight here though, allowing you to grab many a morning coffee at Oxford Yard across the road whilst embracing the easy walking distance to other trendy cafes, restaurants, bars and more along the buzzing local entertainment strip.

Beyond remote-controlled access gates, you will find a comfortable open-plan living, dining and kitchen area on the ground level – split-system air-conditioning, gas-bayonet heating, space for a study nook and all. It even boasts direct access out to a delightful patio-entertaining area with low-maintenance reticulated gardens and a side-access gate at the back of the residence that doubles as an alternative entry point.

The kitchen itself comes well-equipped with a breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, an integrated range hood, a Fisher and Paykel gas cooktop, a separate oven of the same brand, an integrated Westinghouse microwave and a stainless-steel dishwasher for good measure. Upstairs, a huge master suite headlines the carpeted bedrooms (all of which have full-height mirrored built-in wardrobes) and allows you to wake up to a pleasant leafy aspect, alongside an intimate ensuite bathroom with a shower, toilet and vanity.

It really is a case of "position perfect" here, with public transport, schools, shopping, the freeway, the sprawling Leederville Oval, community sporting and recreational facilities, Leederville Train Station, the freeway and beautiful Lake Monger all nearby and very much within arm's reach. Time to get that step count up, once and for all!
